title: Enhancing Software Development Competencies: Emergency Response Capability Development through Postpartum Hemorrhage Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and emergency response protocols
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain postpartum hemorrhage symptom identification and initial response procedures in four steps or fewer.
Learners can perform team-based emergency response procedures with 80% accuracy using medical simulation tools.
Learners can apply three core communication elements from postpartum hemorrhage prevention/management protocols to real-world scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
